title: Hello World
description:
Problem Statement
Print the text "hello world!" N times, with a newline after each line.
Input Format
A single integer N.
Output Format
N lines of "hello world!", with a newline after each occurrence.
testcases:
hello world!
hello world!
hello world!
hello world!
hello world!
hello world!
